mosesta wada shreshta jesus wahanse 1 swargiya kandawimata pangukara wu kithunu sahodarayeni, ape adahille prerithayanan ha uththama pujakayanan da wana jesus wahanse gana kalpana karanna. 2 moses dewiyan wahansege gruhayehi wishwasa wa siti se ma, jesus wahanse da thaman path kala thanan wahanseta wishwasa wa sitina seka. 3 gruhayata wada gruhaya thanu thanaththata gaurawaya aththe yam se da, ese ma mosesta wada jesus wahanse gaurawaya labimata sudusu yayi eeththuganna ladi. 4 manda, sama gruhayak ma nirmanaya karannek sitiyi.
